ModMetaData.name: AI Enhanced Gameplay Mod for RimWorld
ModMetaData.author: Your Name or Team
ModMetaData.description: The AI Enhanced Gameplay Mod integrates advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning to transform RimWorld's gameplay. Key features include AI Core Integration for smarter NPC behavior, Performance Optimization Systems, Procedural Event Generation, and an Adaptive Quest System. NPCs learn from experiences and show emotional intelligence, enhancing social and ethical dynamics within the game. Prepare for a deeply enriched RimWorld experience with nuanced AI interactions, enhanced health systems, and comprehensive debugging tools.
